name.ja: <ruby>ＧＰ<rt>ゴールド・プライド</rt></ruby>－アニヒレーター

text.en:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Monster on the field, or up to 2 instead if your LP are lower than your opponent's; destroy them. You can only use this effect of "Gold Pride - Annihilator" once per turn. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if the previous effect was activated this turn: Return this card to the Extra Deck, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Gold Pride - Assassinator" from your Deck or GY.
